title: Stop picking ezreal
body: He does no damage. Just stop, you're losing yourself games.

replies.body: Great argument 10/10 persuasive essay. Do you have any more enlightening examples of why we shouldn't pick a perfectly viable champion? or do you only pick the handful of champions that are placed in the lcs?

I have a really good KDA with Ezreal. Win-rate, not so much :(
I used to dominate with him but dunno what's happening lately.

He's really good if you can get ahead.

Ezreal is a good ADC in the right hands. What u on?

(Thing is, I'm the left hands. Get it?)

-GL,HF
His damage is skill-shot reliant. If you think he does no damage, its because the person playing him can't land a skill-shot.

http://puu.sh/g4Uat/06d01b3df9.png
ezreal is op, nerf pls

he can be a pain in the ass really, but like any champ it depends on who plays them, example, graves is a champ i find impossible, pretty sure many others don't like him, but i have seen two or three times when he has been devastating.

and also i'm terrible at jax who is pretty famous as an easy champ.

so i guess its about style or something

> He does no damage

Looks like someone can't aim skill shots.
he was played in the lcs and won tho.
